#summary Running NATTT

= Introduction =

You need to be an administrator to run NATT. However, in Linux/Mac, it is sufficient to have access to the TUN/TAP device.
Running NATTT is with the following command on all Operating Systems:

./nattt <config file>
(Read about the [ConfigFile config file]).



= Details =

  * NATTT can be built with debugging support enabled. To do this, please use the -DDEBUG flag in the Makefile (Mac/Linux/UNIX only).
